TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependencyPropertyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class DependencyPropertyConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class DependencyPropertyConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 從字串轉換為 物件。

span.span: Converts from a string to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會將轉換從的執行個體。The class only converts from a into an instance of . 轉換的其他嘗試擲回例外狀況。Other attempts at conversion throw an exception. 從轉換使用下列格式輸入： *typeName*`.`*propertyName*。The converts from a using the following input format: *typeName*`.`*propertyName*. 格式為*namespacePrefix*:*typeName*`.`*propertyName*也接受為舊版，但*namespacePrefix*： 元件會被忽略。A format of *namespacePrefix*:*typeName*`.`*propertyName* is also accepted for legacy reasons but the *namespacePrefix*: component is ignored. 格式為*propertyName*也接受在某些情況下，此格式依賴能夠評估環境的屬性，並且推論出*typeName*，由服務實作的中內容。A format of *propertyName* is also accepted in certain cases; this format relies on the ability to evaluate ambient properties and deduce the *typeName*, by service implementation of in the context. 由於傳統原因，此類別也支援從 BAML 記錄轉換，但這是實作詳細資料，而且不應該依賴在。For legacy reasons, this class also supports conversion from BAML records, but this is an implementation detail and should not be relied upon. 這個轉換子的行為特別導向周圍的單一 WPF XAML 處理案例： 讀取屬性值並產生值。The behavior of this converter is specifically oriented around a single WPF scenario for XAML processing: reading the attribute value of and generating a value.
